name: BabesiosisTestsForBabesiaSpeciesNucleicAcid
title: Babesiosis (Tests for Babesia species Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Babesia species Nucleic Acid.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Babesia Nucleic Acid and Babesia gene;  Plus: 67867-2 Babesia sp identified in Unspecified specimen

LOINC search: babesia nucleic - theileria),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
